item.title: Donâ€™t Make Me Think! - Series Intro
item.description: With web development getting more and more popular by the day thanks to the massive influx of javascript frameworks and design tools, I think it’s important not to loose track of one important area: web usability. Simply put, web usability is the ease of use of a website. Your web or mobile app may work great, but if it isn’t easy to use, people just won’t use it. According to Fast Company, usability is a must-have for optimal return on investment with new technologies.
